datafield.subfield: Bituminous Coal Division and National Bituminous Coal Commission Records
"No information obtained from a producer disclosing cost of production or sales realization shall be made public without the consent of the producer from whom the same shall have been obtained";

holding.publicNote: 1: First statement [NOTE: Added by Mike] [STAFF NOTE: For Z39.50 testing] 2: Second statement [NOTE: Mike again] 3: Third statement [STAFF NOTE: Most people should ignore this note] 4: Fourth statement SUPPLEMENT 1: First holdings statement for supplements [NOTE: Why do we want this?] SUPPLEMENT 2: Second supplementary HS [STAFF NOTE: Staff should enjoy this] INDEX: First HS for indexes [NOTE: What even IS an HS for indexes?]
